translation.en: [man 1] Mayday, mayday! We are under attack.
translation.zh: 紧急情况 我们受到攻击

translation.en: Under attack from our own people.
translation.zh: 受到我们自己人的攻击

translation.en: They just started shooting. They took out everyone.
translation.zh: 他们就直接开始射击 他们把所有人都杀了

translation.en: -[man 2] Why are they doing this? -[man 1] They're ours. What's happening?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要这么做？ 他们是在我们这边的 发生了什么？

translation.en: [man 1] How many are there?
[man 2] They're everywhere! They're going for the command center.
translation.zh: 到处都是 他们去指挥中心了

translation.en: They're going to take out the interceptors.
translation.zh: 他们要让拦截器失效 （美国只有两个预警站）

translation.en: [man 1] They're killing us, they're killing everybody!
translation.zh: 他们要杀了我们 他们要杀了所有人！

translation.en: They reached the command center. I can't hold them off!
translation.zh: 他们到达了指挥中心 我拖不住了！

translation.en: [man 2] Somebody help us! Please, send help!
translation.zh: 快来人救我们！请派人帮忙

translation.en: [man 1] We've got to call SBX-1.
[man 2] We can't! They destroyed the transmitter!
translation.zh: 做不到了！他们摧毁了信号发射器

translation.en: [man 1] This is Fort Greely. We have been overrun. Fort Greely--
translation.zh: 这是格里利堡 我们已经被侵占了 格里利堡…

translation.en: [pilot] Coming up on SBX-1 now, Captain.
[pilot] SBX-1 this is Eagle 6-7.
I got your new missile system specialist here with me.
translation.zh: 我带了你的新导弹系统专家来

translation.en: Request permission to commence final approach.
translation.zh: 请求允许开始最后接近

translation.en: [operator] Eagle 6-7 this is SBX-1, you're cleared for landing.
translation.zh: 老鹰6-7 这里是SBX-1 允许降落

translation.en: Welcome to the middle of nowhere.
Captain Collins, I'm Ensign Washington.
translation.zh: 柯林斯上尉 我是恩赛·华盛顿少尉

translation.en: Welcome to SBX-1,
or should I say "welcome back."
translation.zh: 还是我应该说“欢迎回来”

translation.en: -Thanks. -[Washington] Colonel's waiting for you.
I heard you grew up in Spain at a base your dad was posted at.
translation.zh: 我听说你在西班牙长大 在你父亲任职的一个基地

translation.en: [male voice] Come in.
Captain Collins reporting, sir.
translation.zh: 柯林斯上尉报告 长官

translation.en: At ease.
Good to see you again, JJ.
translation.zh: 很高兴再次见到你 杰洁

translation.en: You remember Captain Welsh?
translation.zh: 你还记得威尔士上尉吗？

translation.en: Yes, sir. You were just taking over when I rotated out.
translation.zh: 是的 长官 你只是在我轮换出去的时候接手

translation.en: Don't you mean escaped?
[Welsh] Listen to this.
-Give us a minute, would you, Lou? -You bet.
translation.zh: -给我们一点时间 好吗 卢？ -没问题

translation.en: See if you can get us an update on that Russian sub.
translation.zh: 看看你能不能给我们 那个俄罗斯潜艇的最新消息

translation.en: Well, as you can see,
everything's pretty much the way you left it.
translation.zh: 一切都和你离开时差不多

translation.en: Navy runs the boat, Army handles the missiles,
translation.zh: 海军负责轮船运行 陆军处理导弹

translation.en: and everyone wants to be anywhere but here.
translation.zh: 所有人都想去别地方 不想来这里

translation.en: -Have you spoke with the board? -Three times.
translation.zh: 你和委员会谈过了吗？ 三次了

translation.en: [Collins] Showed them my record? My reviews?
translation.zh: 给他们看我的记录了？我的评价？

translation.en: Everything.
This was the best you could do?
translation.zh: 你就只能做到这个地步？

translation.en: Sorry.
[Marshall] No, it's okay.
I thought I was done with this shit.
translation.zh: 我以为这些破事都结束了

translation.en: [Marshall] I know.
Never going to change, is it?
translation.zh: 永远都不会改变了 是吧？

translation.en: Thank you for taking me back.
For the record, I believed you from the start.
translation.zh: 声明一下 我从一开始就相信你

translation.en: [Washington] We got you down here.
translation.zh: 我们把你安排到了这里

translation.en: One of our guys nabbed your old room.
translation.zh: 我们的一个人占用了你的旧房间

translation.en: Sorry about that.
Oh, ma'am?
Just want to say
all of us girls are really proud of what you did.
translation.zh: 我们所有女同志 对你所做的感到非常骄傲

translation.en: What happened to you, well it's…
It's happened to a lot of us,
translation.zh: 在我们很多人身上发生过

translation.en: and I just wanted you to know that.
translation.zh: 我只想让你知道这一点

translation.en: I need you in the command center with your sidearm now.
translation.zh: 我需要你立刻带着枪到指挥中心

translation.en: We have an active shooter situation at Fort Greely.
translation.zh: 我们在格里利堡正在发生射击

translation.en: Outsider?
No, one of ours. Looks like more than one.
translation.zh: 不 我们自己人 看起来不止一个

translation.en: [Collins] Interceptors secure?
[Marshall] Unknown.
[Collins] How bad is it?
Greely's gone dark. No calls in or out.
translation.zh: 格里利失联了 发不出信息 也接收不到

translation.en: We're getting all our information off Twitter.
translation.zh: 我们从推特上收集的所有信息

translation.en: [Marshall] Do we have Fort Greely on the line?
translation.zh: 我们接通格里利堡了吗？

translation.en: [soldier] Not yet, sir.
translation.zh: 不 长官 还没有

translation.en: [Marshall] You know what to do.
Is Greely being jammed?
translation.zh: 格里利堡是被干扰了吗？

translation.en: No. It's like someone turned off the system at the source.
translation.zh: 不 好像有人从源头上关闭了系统

translation.en: Corporal Rahul Shah. Joined us six months ago.
translation.zh: 拉胡尔·沙哈下士六个月前加入

translation.en: Captain.
Corporal.
And you remember Beaver.
Miss me, Captain?
Not even once.
[Marshall] How's our Russian friend?
translation.zh: 我们的俄罗斯朋友怎么样了？

translation.en: [Beaver] He's back.
Forty miles out and just sitting there like a turd in a swimming pool.
translation.zh: 65英里外 就坐在那里 像游泳池里的粪块

translation.en: -[Collins] What friend? -Russian attack sub.
translation.zh: 什么俄罗斯朋友？ 俄罗斯攻击潜艇 几个月来一直在附近游荡

translation.en: Been nosing about for months.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯攻击潜艇 几个月来一直在附近游荡

translation.en: Our subs keep chasing him away and he keeps coming back.
translation.zh: 我们的潜艇不停把它驱逐走 它又一直回来

translation.en: What the hell's going on up there?
translation.zh: 那边到底发生了什么啊？

translation.en: Hey. We still on for tonight?
translation.zh: 喂 我们今晚还来吗？

translation.en: Dude, what?
Poker. I want to whip them janitors like last time.
translation.zh: 打牌 我要像上次那样 打败那些清洁工

translation.en: -Not now, Beaver. -What's wrong with now?
translation.zh: -现在不行 海狸 -现在怎么了？

translation.en: We're in an emergency.
Man, this ain't no emergency.
translation.zh: 兄弟 这不是什么紧急情况

translation.en: It's one crackpot with a grudge.
translation.zh: 就是一个怀恨在心的小人

translation.en: I'd invite you, ma'am,
but there'll probably be a bit of locker room talk.
translation.zh: 但牌局中可能有女士不宜的话题

translation.en: I've been practicing against some of the best players in the world
translation.zh: 我一直跟世界上 最好的一些玩家一起练习

translation.en: with this little green guy.
translation.zh: 跟这个绿色小家伙一起

translation.en: Thing's probably more powerful than this entire room.
translation.zh: 这东西可能比这整个房间都强大

translation.en: Great story, Beaver.
In what chapter do you shut the fuck up?
translation.zh: 你的故事到哪一章能闭嘴？

translation.en: Copy that, STRATCOM.
Sir, SBX-1 has just been assigned primary early warning status
translation.zh: 长官 SBX-1 刚被分配了初级早期预警状态

translation.en: while Greely's offline.
All right, as of this moment we're the only interceptor platform
translation.zh: 好了 从现在起 我们是保护美国

translation.en: protecting the United States from a nuclear missile attack.
translation.zh: 不受核导弹攻击的唯一拦截平台了

translation.en: Square your shit away.
translation.zh: 把你们那些没用的都收起来

translation.en: Focus on the job you've been trained to do.
translation.zh: 专注于你们受过训练去做的工作

translation.en: Sir, we sure this is not some kind of drill or emergency test--
translation.zh: 长官 我们确定 这不是演习或紧急测试

translation.en: Quiet.
NSA is relaying chatter from Russia.
translation.zh: 国家安全局正在转播俄罗斯说话

translation.en: Kremlin just received a priority alert from the ICBM missile base in Tavlinka.
translation.zh: 克里姆林宫刚收到塔夫林卡 洲际弹道导弹基地的优先警报

translation.en: Tavlinka site under hostile attack.
translation.zh: 塔夫林卡基地遭到敌意攻击

translation.en: Multiple casualties.
Unauthorized missile removal.
No way.
Sixteen Topol-M mobile missiles unaccounted for.
translation.zh: 16枚白杨M型移动导弹下落不明

translation.en: You're saying someone stole 16 ICBMs?
translation.zh: 你是说有人偷了16枚洲际弹道导弹？

translation.en: I'm not saying it. The Russians are.
translation.zh: 我不是说 是俄罗斯人说的

translation.en: Sir, Greely goes dark
translation.zh: 长官 格里利堡黑了

translation.en: and within 10 minutes a Russian base reports stolen nukes?
translation.zh: 还不到十分钟 一个俄罗斯基地就报告核弹丢了？

translation.en: Look, Greely's real, but this has to be a Russian exercise.
translation.zh: 听着 格里利堡是真的 但这一定是俄罗斯的演习

translation.en: If it were real, the Pentagon would've called us by now.
translation.zh: 如果是真的 五角大楼早就给我们打电话了

translation.en: SBX-1.
Yes, sir.
We are, sir.
It just came in now, sir.
We will, sir.
[in Russian] We have 16 missiles aimed at 16 American cities.
translation.zh: 我们有16枚导弹 瞄准了美国16个城市

translation.en: After this day, America will no longer exist.
translation.zh: 今天之后 美国就不复存在了

translation.en: Jesus.
How do you steal nuclear missiles?
translation.zh: 你们是怎么偷走核导弹的？

translation.en: Had to have been an inside job. You can't just walk in--
translation.zh: 肯定是内线工作 不可能直接走进去…

translation.en: Doesn't matter how they did it. What matters is those missiles are mobile.
translation.zh: 怎么做的不重要 重要的是那些导弹是可以移动的

translation.en: They can hide their nukes anywhere.
translation.zh: 他们可以把核弹藏在任何地方

translation.en: Our satellites won't spot them till they launch.
translation.zh: 我们的卫星在它们发射前不会发现

translation.en: Captain.
[Marshall] JJ.
This is on us now, you understand?
translation.zh: 这是我们的责任了 你明白吗？

translation.en: [Collins] Yes, sir.
We're the only thing standing between America and Armageddon.
translation.zh: 我们是唯一 站在美国和世界末日之间的人

translation.en: You up for this?
Don't worry about me, sir.
Sorry. Had to ask.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我必须问一句

translation.en: I'll start the emergency lockdown.
You do that.
I need to find Welsh and secure the HVAR codes.
translation.zh: 我要找到威尔士 并取得高价值资产移除命令

translation.en: Sir, wait Sir.
translation.zh: 长官 等一下 长官

translation.en: If they had people inside Tavlinka,
translation.zh: 如果他们在塔夫林卡里面有人

translation.en: and the shooters at Greely were all ours,
translation.zh: 而格里利堡的射击者都是我们的人

translation.en: they might have someone… here.
translation.zh: 他们在这里也可能…有人

translation.en: Go.
[man] The keycard!
[man] The keycard! Get the keycard!
Mikael! The door. Open the door!
Goddammit, you're a big boy.
Did you send the SOS?
translation.zh: 紧急求救信号发送了吗？

translation.en: Did you just stab that dude in the eye with your gun?
translation.zh: 你刚才用枪戳进了那家伙的眼睛吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Did you send the SOS?
translation.zh: 对 紧急求救信号发送了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I sent it. They told me to stand by.
translation.zh: 是的 我发了 他们叫我待命

translation.en: [Collins] How is Beaver?
Bullet clipped him. He's unconscious, but he'll be okay.
translation.zh: 子弹打中了他 他昏迷不醒 但会好的

translation.en: Is that acid?
[Shah] Why would they bring acid?
Destroy the circuitry.
Make this place useless.
What are we going to do?
You want to talk about it?
Leave now and you might escape with your life.
translation.zh: 现在离开 你还可能会活着逃走

translation.en: Let me in
and you might escape with yours.
You are the terrorists who stole the missiles from Tavlinka?
translation.zh: 你们是偷导弹的恐怖分子？

translation.en: [man] You know, it would be a hell of a coincidence if I wasn't.
translation.zh: 你知道 如果我不是的话 那也太巧合了

translation.en: Put one on Beaver.
And the shooters at Greely?
Subcontractors.
It's a gig economy.
Can't work at a US base without an extensive background check.
translation.zh: 没有全面的背景调查 就无法在美军基地工作

translation.en: You're telling me. The paperwork is a nightmare.
translation.zh: 你还说我 文书工作是一场噩梦

translation.en: That would mean you've been planning this--
translation.zh: 那就表示你已经计划这个…

translation.en: [man] For a very long time.
[Collins] How long is a very long time?
Six years.
Not going so well for you, is it?
No plan survives contact with the enemy completely intact.
translation.zh: 没有一个计划 能在与敌人完整接触的情况下幸存

translation.en: Are we enemies? You sound American.
translation.zh: 我们是敌人吗？你听起来像美国人

translation.en: [man] I am American.
And whether or not you and I are enemies
is completely up to you.
What's your name?
My name is Alexander Kessel.
You say that like I should know it.
translation.zh: 你说得好像我应该知道似的

translation.en: And now that you do, you will never forget it.
translation.zh: 现在你知道了 你永远都不会忘记

translation.en: How about I just call you "asshole"?
You know, usually it takes a woman a second date to reach that conclusion.
translation.zh: 其实 一般第二次约会 女人才会得出这个结论

translation.en: Nothing usual about me.
You know, I'm kind of getting that.
translation.zh: 你知道 我有点理解

translation.en: So, Captain, seems as though you and I are at an impasse
translation.zh: 上尉 我们似乎陷入了僵局

translation.en: because I need to disable your command center
translation.zh: 因为我需要让你的指挥中心瘫痪

translation.en: so my people in Russia can fire those missiles.
translation.zh: 才能让我俄罗斯的人发射那些导弹

translation.en: And you need to keep me out.
But, full disclosure,
I have contained or killed everyone else on this vessel,
translation.zh: 我已经把这艘船上其他的每个人 控制或者杀了

translation.en: so I will be getting into that room.
Let me in now
and I will spare your lives.
And let millions of Americans die?
I don't think you realize why someone joins the Army.
translation.zh: 我想你不明白为什么别人会参军

translation.en: You are alone in the middle of the ocean,
miles from any port,
way beyond the nearest shipping lane.
No one is going to be able to get here and save you
before I cut through these doors.
Hey, Shah, how many janitors are there?
translation.zh: 嗨 沙哈 有多少清洁工？

translation.en: I don't know. Six, seven?
-Which is it, six or seven? -[Shah] I don't know. I didn't hire them.
translation.zh: 是哪个？六还是七？ 我不知道 不是我雇的

translation.en: This is a big rig.
You couldn't have killed everyone so quickly.
translation.zh: 不可能这么快就杀了所有人

translation.en: [Kessel] Nerve agent.
Released it through the A/C. Put 'em all right to sleep.
translation.zh: 通过空调释放 让他们安然睡去了

translation.en: [snorts] Bullshit.
If it makes any difference, they felt nothing.
translation.zh: 如果有什么不同 他们没有感觉

translation.en: We did have to shoot them to be sure.
translation.zh: 我们确实必须对他们开枪 才能保证

translation.en: [Kessel] Don't worry.
The command center has its own A/C, and try as I might…
translation.zh: 指挥中心有自己的空调 我会倾尽全力

translation.en: You can't access it.
Would we be having this awesome little conversation if I could?
translation.zh: 如果我能 我们还会进行 现在这段美妙的对话吗？

translation.en: -SBX-1. This is Captain Collins. -Is this real?
translation.zh: -SX1-1 我是柯林斯上尉 -这是真的吗？

translation.en: -General Dyson. Where's Colonel Marshall? -[man] Everyone quiet.
translation.zh: -戴森上将 马歇尔上校在哪里？ -大家安静

translation.en: He's dead, sir.
Dead? What happened?
Six to seven terrorists disguised as janitors seized our vessel.
translation.zh: 六到七名伪装成清洁工的恐怖分子 占领了我们的轮船

translation.en: They killed Marshall, they claim they have killed the crew,
translation.zh: 他们杀了马歇尔 说他们杀了全部船员

translation.en: -and tried to take the command center. -Tried?
translation.zh: 曾试图攻占指挥中心 曾试图？

translation.en: -And failed. -[Dyson] Who's there with you?
translation.zh: 并失败了 谁跟你在一起？

translation.en: Corporals Shah and Baker.
Baker's unconscious. Hit by a bullet.
translation.zh: 贝克昏迷不醒 被子弹击中

translation.en: How secure are you?
They're using blowtorches to cut through the outer door.
translation.zh: 他们在用喷灯切开外门

translation.en: Best guess…
Sixty minutes.
Make that 30 minutes.
-[Dyson] And the inner door? -Same. I don't know.
translation.zh: 内门呢？ 一样 我不知道

translation.en: What can you tell us about these terrorists?
translation.zh: 关于这些恐怖分子 你能告诉我们什么？

translation.en: American. Leader says his name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.zh: 美国人 带头人说 他的名字叫亚历山大·凯塞尔

translation.en: Get me a full background check on this guy. What else?
translation.zh: 帮我找个这家伙的完整背景调查 还有什么？

translation.en: They move like they've been trained,
translation.zh: 他们的行动方式 感觉是训练过的

translation.en: and they're using nerve agents.
What's happening at Greely?
Shooters are dead.
Unfortunately, so are the computers that control the interceptors.
translation.zh: 不幸的是 那些控制拦截器的电脑也毁了

translation.en: Burned them all with acid.
So it's just us.
Afraid so.
A SEAL team is inbound to you.
translation.zh: 一组海豹突击队正在去找你们

translation.en: You have to hang on a little longer.
-ETA? -Ninety minutes.
Are they joking?
-No, we are not joking. -[Collins] Madam President.
translation.zh: 不 我们不是在开玩笑 总统女士

translation.en: The terrorists have 16 mobile missile launchers
translation.zh: 恐怖分子有16个移动导弹发射器

translation.en: that we and the Russians cannot find.
translation.zh: 我们和俄罗斯人都找不到

translation.en: Only reason they haven't launched them yet
translation.zh: 他们还没有发射的唯一原因

translation.en: is because you still have control of your interceptors.
translation.zh: 是因为你还控制着你的拦截器

translation.en: The second you don't,
they will launch those missiles on the United States.
translation.zh: 他们就会往美国发射那些导弹

translation.en: Now, we don't have time to evacuate 16 cities,
translation.zh: 现在 我们没有时间 疏散16个城市的人民

translation.en: so we're counting on you to keep those maniacs out of that room.
translation.zh: 所以我们就指望你 阻拦那些疯子进入那间房子了

translation.en: Understood, Madam President.
We'll get back to you soon. Keep us updated.
translation.zh: 我们很快会再联系你们 随时通知我们

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Captain, hold that room.
translation.zh: 上尉 守住那个房间

translation.en: [soldier] Let's move out! Go!
[operator] SEAL team, you are clear for immediate departure to SBX-1.
translation.zh: 海豹突击队 你们可以立刻出发去SBX-1了

translation.en: Ninety minutes? There's no way we can last that long.
Not without a fight.
What? No. No, no.
I'm not a fighter. I'm a signal specialist.
translation.zh: 我不是战士 我是信号专家

translation.en: I sit at a desk and stare at a screen, and know what? I like it.
translation.zh: 我坐在桌子旁盯着屏幕 你知道吗？我很喜欢

translation.en: Know why? Because nothing ever happens.
translation.zh: 知道为什么吗？ 因为什么事都没发生过

translation.en: I mean, I haven't fired a gun since basic.
translation.zh: 我是说 从基础训练之后 我就没再开过枪

translation.en: Don't worry. Guns still work the same.
translation.zh: 别担心 枪支还是一样的用法

translation.en: Look, you can't count on me. You can't.
translation.zh: 听着 你不能指望我 不行

translation.en: You surrender?
Do you?
Still quite enjoying fucking up your day.
translation.zh: 还是很享受毁掉你的一天

translation.en: Do you know anything about the fall of Rome?
translation.zh: 你知道罗马沦陷的事吗？

translation.en: When the barbarians massed outside the city gates
translation.zh: 当野蛮人在城门外集结时

translation.en: they did unspeakable things to try and force the Romans to let them in.
translation.zh: 他们做了难以形容的事 试图强迫罗马人让他们进去

translation.en: Exitus actum probat. "The result justifies the deed."
You remember Captain Welsh?
translation.zh: 你还记得威尔士上尉吗？

translation.en: He's a father of four and a grandfather of seven.
translation.zh: 他是四个孩子的父亲 七个孩子的祖父、外祖父

translation.en: [Collins] This is not gonna work.
Open the doors.
You can't let him die.
I will not open these doors.
If you don't, I will kill him.
translation.zh: 如果你不开 我就杀了他

translation.en: I will not open these doors.
Last chance.
No.
Kill anyone you want.
I will never open this door.
translation.zh: 我永远不会打开这扇门

translation.en: We're going to die too, aren't we?
translation.zh: 我们也会死的 对吧？

translation.en: We are not gonna die.
They're gonna get in here. They're gonna kill us.
-Corporal. -There's nothing we can do to stop them!
Corporal Shah, they're not in here yet,
translation.zh: 沙哈下士 他们还没有进来

translation.en: but if we're going to keep them out, I need you thinking clearly.
translation.zh: 但如果我们需要让他们留在外面 我需要你想清楚

translation.en: We still have a job to do, right?
translation.zh: 我们还有工作要做 对吧？

translation.en: Right.
So go back to your post and keep our scanners on Tavlinka.
translation.zh: 所以回到你的岗位上 继续扫描塔夫林卡

translation.en: And if they launch?
We intercept.
We also need to figure out every way they can penetrate this room.
translation.zh: 我们还需要弄清楚 他们能进入这个房间的所有方式

translation.en: Tunnel's the only direct way, in or out.
translation.zh: 隧道是唯一的直接进出通道

translation.en: What about indirect? Any new piping or conduits I should know about?
translation.zh: 间接的方式呢？ 有我需要知道的新管道或导管吗？

translation.en: Plumbing comes through a conduit in the floor
translation.zh: 水管是通过地板上的管道进入

translation.en: too small for anyone to fit through.
translation.zh: 太细了 人钻不进去

translation.en: Same for the cables.
What else could they do? Think.
What about blowing the radar dome?
Dome's reinforced even stronger than we are.
translation.zh: 雷达罩加固了 比我们还强

translation.en: Same with the interceptors.
Get me eyes outside the hatches, top and bottom.
translation.zh: 给我看舱口外的监控 从上到下都看

translation.en: Get the shotgun.
Shoot him!
Shoot him now!
Looks like it was just the one.
When was the last time this thing was test fired?
translation.zh: 这玩意最后一次测试射击 是什么时候？

translation.en: I don't know. Can it still work?
translation.zh: 我不知道 还能用吗？

translation.en: Not without blowing up in your face.
translation.zh: 不能了 除非在你面前炸开

translation.en: -What about your pistol? -Out.
[sighs] So we have no weapons.
Help me.
[Shah] Thanks for saving Turbo.
[Collins] Who?
Turbo, the turtle. My kids gave him to me.
translation.zh: 蜗宝 乌龟 我的孩子们给我的

translation.en: How many kids you got?
Prisha, she's nine. Aditi, seven. And Kalyan, he's three.
translation.zh: 普丽莎 她九岁了 阿迪提 七岁 还有卡利安 他三岁

translation.en: I haven't seen them for six months.
translation.zh: 我已经六个月没见他们了

translation.en: Best thing you can do for them now is help me stop those missiles.
translation.zh: 你现在能为他们做的最好的事 就是帮我阻止那些导弹

translation.en: Anything?
[Shah] They got everyone.
He's just going to keep buzzing till you answer.
[Shah] What do you want now?
Captain, you should see this.
translation.zh: 上尉 你应该看看这个

translation.en: Think you're the first one to throw that in my face?
translation.zh: 你以为你是第一个 给我看这个的人吗？

translation.en: Think you're gonna break me?
translation.zh: 你以为你会让我崩溃吗？

translation.en: No.
And yes.
-[Collins] It's gonna take more than that. -I've got more coming.
translation.zh: 肯定不止如此 我还有更多

translation.en: No, you don't. You're scrambling.
translation.zh: 不 你没有 你在捣乱

translation.en: -[Kessel] Am I? -Desperately.
How so?
You're a planner.
translation.zh: 你是个万事提前策划的人

translation.en: Six years, you said.
Looking for ways to beat the security, getting your people aboard,
translation.zh: 想办法打败安保人员 让你的人上船

translation.en: you must have gone over and over these things
translation.zh: 计划上的细节 你一定都仔细预演过无数遍

translation.en: until you were absolutely sure you planned for every possible outcome,
translation.zh: 直到你绝对确定 你已经为每一种可能的结果计划好了

translation.en: but you couldn't plan for me.
You know how I know?
translation.zh: 你知道我怎么知道的吗？

translation.en: Because I'm meant to be in Fort Hunter right now on my new post.
translation.zh: 因为我本来是要去猎人堡的新岗位

translation.en: Only fell through late last night when they reassigned me here.
translation.zh: 直到昨晚 他们才把我改调到这里

translation.en: And now…
Now you can't beat me.
I'll give you "unexpected."
But not unbeatable.
See, here's what I know.
translation.zh: 听着 以下是我知道的

translation.en: I know that three years ago, you scored your dream job.
translation.zh: 我知道 三年前 你得到了梦想中的工作

translation.en: Pentagon, three-star General.
translation.zh: 五角大楼 三星将军

translation.en: A battlefield hero, his troops loved him.
translation.zh: 战场上的英雄 他的军队很爱他

translation.en: They were going to build a statue to the guy.
translation.zh: 他们要给那家伙建一座雕像

translation.en: And he promised to take you all the way to the top,
but then you learned the price you'd have to pay.
translation.zh: 但后来你学到了必须要学到的教训

translation.en: I know the Army review board just decided you made it all up.
translation.zh: 我知道军队审查委员会决定 那都是你编造的

translation.en: Threw you right back into the lion's den.
I know that three-star welcomed you with open arms.
translation.zh: 我知道那个三星级的人 张开双臂欢迎你

translation.en: Because predators always want to show you exactly who's in charge.
translation.zh: 因为捕食者 总是想让你知道到底谁在主宰

translation.en: Wait, that general got discharged.
translation.zh: 等等 那个将军被退伍了

translation.en: Which means you beat him. You won.
translation.zh: 也就是说 你打败了他 你赢了

translation.en: She won the battle, not the war.
translation.zh: 她赢得了战斗 不是战争

translation.en: See, first came the hate mail.
translation.zh: 看吧 首先是仇恨信…

translation.en: The bounty hunt for these lewd photos…
translation.zh: （说谎的荡妇 你违背了规定） …赏金追捕这些淫荡照片…

translation.en: …then the death threats.
[Kessel] All from within the army that you so proudly served.
translation.zh: 都是来自你为之骄傲服役的军队内部

translation.en: Then finally…
that night.
[man] JJ! JJ!
JJ, come on!
Come on, wake up. JJ!
Come on. Wake up. Come back.
Papa?
It's okay, it's okay. Papa's here. It's okay. I got you.
translation.zh: 没事的 爸爸来了 没事的 有我呢

translation.en: Papa… sorry.
You are beatable, Captain.
translation.zh: 你是可以被打败的 上尉

translation.en: It's been proven.
If you are so right,
then what am I doing here?
Why do I still wear the uniform?
War's not over yet, motherfucker.
translation.zh: 战争还没结束 混蛋

translation.en: You should be working with me.
In fact, I will give you 30 million dollars
translation.zh: 事实上 如果你打开这些门

translation.en: if you open these doors.
I will have you flown to the country of your choosing
translation.zh: 我会让你飞到一个你选择的国家

translation.en: where you can live the rest of your life in luxury.
translation.zh: 在那里你可以奢侈地过完你的一生

translation.en: If anyone has earned the right to walk away from this, it's you.
translation.zh: 如果有谁有权利离开这里 那就是你

translation.en: Thirty million dollars.
What did the Army ever give you?
Your depressing old job in the middle of nowhere,
translation.zh: 你令人沮丧的老工作 把你扔到了这个破地方

translation.en: where they can forget about you?
They don't care about you.
Open these doors.
Take back your power.
That's how you win a war.
[pilot] SEAL team is inbound to SBX-1. ETA 67 minutes.
translation.zh: 海豹突击队正在接近SBX-1 预计还剩67分钟抵达

translation.en: [Collins] They're in.
Open the door and you leave here a wealthy woman.
translation.zh: 快开门 你走的时候就是个有钱人了

translation.en: We still have time before you cut through this door.
translation.zh: 在你切开这扇门之前 我们还有时间

translation.en: -You really don't. -[gun cocks]
-[Collins] Beaver. -[Shah] What?
[Collins] Nice, Beaver.
Initiating satellite relay and EBS hack.
translation.zh: 启动卫星中继并攻击紧急广播系统

translation.en: We're in.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu Sierra Bravo, 1-9-9-6.
And tell Danny to move in.
Are you hurt?
I've had worse.
It really didn't have to be this way.
If Corporal Baker doesn't get hit, we avoid all of this.
translation.zh: 如果贝克下士没被打中 我们就能避免这一切

translation.en: If you're gonna kill me, just kill me.
translation.zh: 如果你要杀了我 就杀了我吧

translation.en: No mansplaining.
I gave you choices.
It was your decision to become enemies.
translation.zh: 是你决定成为我的敌人的

translation.en: You were with them this whole time?
translation.zh: 你一直跟他们是一伙的？

translation.en: Yeah.
[Shah grunts] Traitor.
America's the traitor.
[Collins] Always were full of shit, Beaver.
translation.zh: 一直都满嘴喷粪 海狸

translation.en: [Beaver] Ah, what do you know?
I love my country.
Hell, there was a time I would have even died for it. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 天啊 曾经我愿意为它出生入死

translation.en: Never too late.
Shut up.
It's because of immigrants like you
and like you
that I lost my job
and the government took away my rights,
started making up all kinds of shit to scare me.
translation.zh: 开始编造各种东西来吓我

translation.en: [Beaver] Shit. I don't even recognize America these days.
translation.zh: 该死 我最近都不认识美国了

translation.en: And that gives you the right to murder millions of people?
translation.zh: 那你就有权利杀害上百万无辜的人？

translation.en: Well, it gives me the right to start looking out for myself.
translation.zh: 这让我有权利开始照顾自己

translation.en: And now I got ten million ways to do that.
translation.zh: 现在我有一千万种方法来实现

translation.en: Money? That's what this is about?
[Beaver] Uh, yeah. It's what America's about.
translation.zh: 嗯 对 这就是美国的意义

translation.en: And if you don't get that,
you obviously haven't been paying attention, Shah.
translation.zh: 那你显然没有注意过 沙哈

translation.en: Wake up, man.
Yeah, sure. Sure. Blame America. Blame the government.
translation.zh: 是的 当然 怪罪美国 怪罪政府

translation.en: Blame everyone else but you.
translation.zh: 怪罪所有人 除了你自己

translation.en: That's what all losers do.
translation.zh: 所有的失败者都会这么做

translation.en: You just keep on talking, darlin'.
translation.zh: 你就继续说吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Because before this is all over,
translation.zh: 因为在这一切结束之前

translation.en: I'm gonna do to you
what every enlisted grunt secretly wants to do
translation.zh: 每个士兵对每个女士官

translation.en: to every female officer.
The only way you can get it, isn't it?
translation.zh: 这是你唯一能得到女人的时候了 不是吗？

translation.en: Hey. Another thing.
Never call a woman by anything other than her name.
translation.zh: 称呼女人的时候就要叫她的名字

translation.en: Not honey, or honey pie, or sugar, or sugar pie,
translation.zh: 别叫什么可爱、小可爱 或者甜心、小甜甜

translation.en: or sweetie, or sweetie pie.
Not baby, sweetheart, ho, bitch,
translation.zh: 别叫宝贝、宝宝、骚货、贱货

translation.en: and above all, most of all, beyond all else,
translation.zh: 还有 除此以外 最重要的是

translation.en: don't ever, ever, call her "darlin'."
Satellite relay's live on the EBS.
translation.zh: 卫星信号可以在紧急广播系统直播了

translation.en: The Emergency Broadcast System?
Yeah, so that every camera on this rig
translation.zh: 没错 所以 这个拦截站上的每台摄像机

translation.en: can be broadcast to any device that has smart capabilities.
translation.zh: 可以广播到任何智能设备上

translation.en: Wouldn't want anyone missing the show.
translation.zh: 我不想让任何人错过节目

translation.en: Mr. Kessel. Where's Captain Collins?
translation.zh: 凯塞尔先生 柯林斯上尉在哪里？

translation.en: She's here. She's unharmed.
translation.zh: 她在这儿 她没有受伤

translation.en: Well… relatively.
As is Corporal Shah.
[Dyson] And Corporal Baker?
Howdy, General.
[Dyson] You two are servicemen.
You took an oath.
How could you betray your country?
translation.zh: 你们怎么能背叛自己的国家？

translation.en: I swore an oath to the old America. Not this one.
translation.zh: 我向过去的美国发过誓 不是现在这个

translation.en: [Dyson] What do you want?
[Kessel] From you?
I'm just waiting for America to join our little chat here.
translation.zh: 我只是在等美国加入我们的聊天室

translation.en: Dad's proud. That must be nice.
translation.zh: 爸爸很骄傲 这感觉一定很好

translation.en: EBS has slaved all signals.
translation.zh: 紧急广播系统控制了所有信号

translation.en: Say hello to America, boss.
translation.zh: 跟美国打个招呼 老大

translation.en: So you know it's got a big screen, great picture quality, you know,
translation.zh: 所以你知道它有 很大的屏幕、很好的画质 你知道

translation.en: the sound's kind of meh,
but I don't really listen to the TV that much.
translation.zh: 但是我其实就不怎么需要听电视

translation.en: I play music when I watch and stuff so it doesn't really…
translation.zh: 我在看电视的时候会放音乐 所以其实不怎么…

translation.en: Why'd it go black and white?
Where's the President?
I'm here.
If you launch even one of those missiles,
translation.zh: 如果你发射任何一枚导弹

translation.en: I swear before God that we will hunt you down
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 我们会追捕你到天涯海角

translation.en: and wipe you from existence.
That's enough. You're boring me.
translation.zh: 够了 你让我觉得无聊

translation.en: I'm taking your bully pulpit now.
translation.zh: 我现在要占据你的名望讲坛

translation.en: My fellow Americans, I am Alexander Kessel,
translation.zh: 我的美国同胞们 我是亚历山大·凯塞尔

translation.en: son of trust fund billionaire, Alexander Kessel Senior,
translation.zh: 信托基金亿万富翁 老亚历山大·凯塞尔的儿子

translation.en: who you may also know
is the current utterly unqualified US ambassador to the United Nations.
translation.zh: 他是完全不称职的 现任美国驻联合国大使

translation.en: Now, my associates in Russia control 16 nuclear missiles,
translation.zh: 现在 我在俄罗斯的伙伴 控制着16枚核导弹

translation.en: and I control the only interceptor missiles
translation.zh: 而我控制着有能力阻止它们的

translation.en: that are capable of stopping them.
Sixteen American cities have been targeted.
300 million of you will die.
One city will be destroyed first
translation.zh: 一个城市会率先被击毁

translation.en: so that the rest of you can watch in horror.
translation.zh: 这样你们其他人可以惊恐地欣赏

translation.en: Missile team one…
fire.
[computer voice] Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected.
Intercept launch expires in 12 minutes.
[Kessel] Now in 12 minutes, that missile I just launched,
translation.zh: 现在12分钟后 我刚刚发射的那枚导弹

translation.en: will pass over my head,
at which point, it will be too late for this interceptor to catch it.
translation.zh: 到那时候就太晚了 这个拦截站接不住

translation.en: But which city has been chosen?
Is it yours?
Wherever it lands, there's no time to run.
translation.zh: 不管它落在哪里 都没有时间逃跑

translation.en: You can't flee.
If you guessed Los Angeles,
congratulations.
The City of Angels has 23 minutes left to live.
translation.zh: 天使之城还能活23分钟了

translation.en: Wait a second.
Once Los Angeles is gone,
And the fear of every American is at its peak…
translation.zh: 各位 哪里… 等一下 我们还没关门

translation.en: We're not closing yet.
translation.zh: 等一下 我们还没关门

translation.en: …I will launch a second wave of 15 nuclear missiles.
translation.zh: 我会发射第二波15枚核导弹

translation.en: San Francisco, Seattle, Las Vegas,
translation.zh: 旧金山、西雅图、拉斯维加斯

translation.en: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, St. Louis, Atlanta, Boston,
translation.zh: 辛辛那提、达拉斯、丹佛、孟菲斯 芝加哥、圣路易斯、亚特兰大 波士顿、费城、迈阿密、纽约

translation.en: Philadelphia, Miami, New York.
translation.zh: 波士顿、费城、迈阿密、纽约

translation.en: And of course, Washington DC.
translation.zh: 当然了 还有华盛顿

translation.en: Today…
America dies in a paroxysm of fear.
translation.zh: 美国在突发恐惧中死去

translation.en: America is the greatest lie ever told.
translation.zh: 美国是史上最大的谎言

translation.en: American exceptionalism?
Maybe once.
When the founders got rid of kings.
When they declared that all men are created equal.
translation.zh: 当他们宣布所有人都平等时

translation.en: Now they say ours are United States, but when was that true?
translation.zh: 现在他们说 我们的国家是美国 但那什么时候实现了？

translation.en: Was it true during the Civil War?
Or Jim Crow?
translation.zh: 还是吉姆·克罗法实现了？

translation.en: Hell, is it true now?
You know, this national lie, it's a festering wound,
translation.zh: 这个国家谎言 这个溃烂的创伤

translation.en: and it's fatal.
There's no Band-Aid to patch it.
No, the only way to save our nation and the promise it once held
translation.zh: 拯救我们国家 实现它曾经许下的诺言 唯一的方法

translation.en: is to erase it. Start over.
So maybe then. when we are staring at each other
from across the rubble,
we will all agree that this time
translation.zh: 我们都会同意 这一次

translation.en: we're going to get America right.
This is Corporal Rahul Shah.
Do you like being an American, Rahul?
translation.zh: 你喜欢做美国人吗 拉胡尔？

translation.en: With all my heart.
But you're a Hindu.
You can be both.
In America?
You've never been mocked for your faith?
translation.zh: 你从来没有因为信仰被嘲笑过？

translation.en: Never been the subject to enhanced screenings at airports?
translation.zh: 从来没在机场 被强迫做过强化检查吗？

translation.en: Share with the world what you've seen.
translation.zh: 跟全世界分享你所看到的

translation.en: I've seen you in the showers,
translation.zh: 我曾看到了你在淋浴间 那么细

translation.en: and I can see why you're obsessed with missiles.
translation.zh: 我看到了你为什么如此执迷于导弹了

translation.en: Pathetic.
I got this, boss. [inhaling]
This is Captain Joanna Julia Collins.
translation.zh: 这位是乔安娜·胡莉亚·柯林斯上尉

translation.en: JJ to her friends.
translation.zh: 杰洁有话要跟她的同伴说

translation.en: A soldier who has fought with honor and courage here today.
translation.zh: 今天在这里以荣誉和勇气战斗的士兵

translation.en: Now, three years ago, one of our nation's top generals
translation.zh: 现在 三年前 我们国家最好的将军之一

translation.en: tried to abuse his position of power and force her to have sex with him.
translation.zh: 试图滥用自己的职权 强迫她发生关系

translation.en: Whose career was ruined?
showering her with praise,
but she's a woman,
so instead her fellow service members
translation.zh: 所以只能是她的军队同伴们

translation.en: put out a bounty hunt on photos like this.
translation.zh: 贴出这种照片进行赏金追捕

translation.en: You're an asshole, dude.
translation.zh: 你真是个混蛋 兄弟

translation.en: I offered her 30 million dollars to give up her post today.
translation.zh: 我今天给她出价三千万 让她放弃自己的职位

translation.en: She refused.
She took that photo for charity, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便说一句 她拍这张照片是为了慈善

translation.en: What position were you? Were you goalkeeper?
translation.zh: 你是什么职位？你是守门员吗？

translation.en: Goalkeeper. It's a tough position.
translation.zh: 守门员 这是个艰难的职位

translation.en: Beg your pardon?
You take a lot of hits, concussions, bruised ribs,
translation.zh: 我经受了多次撞击 脑震荡、肋骨撞伤

translation.en: but the most common injury is dislocated thumbs.
translation.zh: 但最常见的受伤是拇指错位

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Beaver] Oh shit.
[Kessel] No! Shit! [panting]
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in six minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射六分钟后失效

translation.en: Think you can make it?
Do you?
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射五分钟后失效

translation.en: You have five minutes. Hold her or kill her.
translation.zh: 你有五分钟 拦住她 要么就杀了她

translation.en: [computer voice] Interceptor launched.
[computer voice] Missile intercepted.
Fucking die already, would you?
Remember? I said, "Whatever happens, make sure you shoot her first." [sniffs]
translation.zh: 记得吗？ 我说： “不管发生什么事 一定要先击毙她”

translation.en: "You just take her out of the fight, because if you don't do that,
translation.zh: “把她弄出去 因为如果你不这样

translation.en: if you don't just put her down right away, man, she's gonna be trouble."
translation.zh: 如果你不快点干掉她 她一定会惹麻烦”

translation.en: Beaver.
She's… She's just one of those women, you know?
translation.zh: 她… 她就是一个女人 你知道吗？

translation.en: She just likes to just get under your skin and just needle you, man.
translation.zh: 她就是喜欢抓你的弱点 给你添麻烦 兄弟

translation.en: Like a… like a fucking needle.
This is a setback and nothing more.
[Beaver] Setback?
Oh. Good.
Hey, did you hear that? It's a setback. That's cool.
translation.zh: 喂 你听到了吗？ 这是个挫折 太酷了

translation.en: She shot the goddamn missile out of the sky!
translation.zh: 她把该死的导弹从空中射出去了！

translation.en: It's one missile. There are 15 left.
translation.zh: 只是一枚导弹而已 还剩下15枚

translation.en: And what happens if she shoots them down too, huh?
translation.zh: 如果她也击落那些 会怎么样？

translation.en: What then? What do we do then?
translation.zh: 到时候呢？到时候我们怎么办？

translation.en: Our faces, man, they're all over the world right now.
translation.zh: 我们的脸 兄弟 现在全世界到处都是了

translation.en: What do we do then?
What's the statute of limitations on attempted nuking?
translation.zh: 发射核弹未遂的诉讼时效是多久？

translation.en: We are prepared for this. We have backup plans.
translation.zh: 我们针对这种情况准备好了 我们有备用计划

translation.en: Really? [sighs]
You played that one pretty close to the buzzer.
translation.zh: 你刚才刚好拦截住了导弹

translation.en: [panting] Doing my best here, ma'am.
Can you turn off the TV coverage?
Give me a minute.
Not from here.
[Dyson] Understood.
How long till the SEALS get here?
translation.zh: 海豹突击队要多久才能到？

translation.en: Fifty minutes. They're going as fast as they can.
translation.zh: 50分钟 他们已经以最快速度赶过去了

translation.en: Not fast enough.
[Dyson] And we got some background on Alexander Kessel.
translation.zh: 我们拿到了 一些亚历山大·凯塞尔的背景资料

translation.en: He was Army, military intelligence.
translation.zh: 之前在陆军 军事情报员

translation.en: Started out doing Russian work,
translation.zh: 刚开始做俄罗斯相关工作

translation.en: then became a psy ops and torture specialist.
translation.zh: 然后成为了心理行动与折磨专家

translation.en: [Collins] Torture?
[Dyson] He was good. Too good sometimes.
translation.zh: 他很厉害 有时候太过厉害了

translation.en: Killed two prisoners while he was torturing them.
translation.zh: 他在折磨囚犯时 杀了两个

translation.en: [Collins] Jesus. I'm dealing with a genuine psychopath.
translation.zh: 天啊 我在对付一个真正的神经病

translation.en: You're not alone. Lot of smart people here trying to figure out a way to help you.
translation.zh: 你不是一个人 这里有很多聪明人想办法帮你

translation.en: Tacticians, game theorists.
Fuck theory. I need some fucking soldiers with guns.
translation.zh: 该死的理论 我需要一些带枪的士兵

translation.en: I hear you, Captain.
Come on, give her some guns, man.
translation.zh: 来 给她点枪 兄弟

translation.en: If you don't mind me saying, you are one armor-plated woman.
translation.zh: 如果你不介意我这样说 你真是个钢铁盔甲女人

translation.en: Army never should have picked a fight with you.
translation.zh: 陆军永远不该跟你作对

translation.en: Got that right.
Rahul.
What'd I miss?
Not much.
Did we stop the missile?
Yeah. We stopped it.
Nice.
Wait. Where's all the bad guys?
That Alexander dude must be pissed at you.
translation.zh: 亚历山大那个家伙一定很生你的气

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's because I'm still fucking up his day.
translation.zh: 是啊 那是因为 我还在毁掉他美好的一天

translation.en: [Collins] Papa?
Hey. How you feeling?
You up for some soup?
Sure.
You saw what they did.
[Papa] I'll take care of it.
Do not let them get to you now. Don't let them win.
translation.zh: 别让他们影响你 别让他们赢

translation.en: They hate me.
You told the truth.
Nobody cares about the truth.
[Papa] I care.
I've lost everything. Everything I ever worked for.
translation.zh: 我失去了一切 我为之努力的一切

translation.en: Hey, hey.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
The one rule in life?
Never stop fighting.
[Papa] You got fight in you, kid.
translation.zh: 你有自己内心的战斗 孩子

translation.en: Always have. Just like your mama.
translation.zh: 一向如此 就像你妈妈一样

translation.en: [Shah] Captain?
He wants to talk.
How long have I been out?
[Shah] Not long. Fifteen minutes or so.
[Collins] What now, asshole?
You think I'm a monster.
I was.
You know, growing up, I never summered where I wintered. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 小时候 我从来 没在过冬的地方过夏天

translation.en: I was either on a yacht in the Hamptons or skiing in Val d'Isère.
translation.zh: 我要么在汉普顿的游艇上 要么在伊泽尔谷滑雪

translation.en: Sucks to be you, dude.
translation.zh: 那你的生活真是太糟糕了 老兄

translation.en: I'm not complaining.
I was the product of a failed society.
translation.zh: 我是一个失败社会的产物

translation.en: A society that consistently rewards money and ignores everything else.
translation.zh: 一个一直奖励金钱 却无视其他一切的社会

translation.en: What? You think my father became ambassador to the UN
translation.zh: 什么？你们以为 我父亲成为大使 去了联合国

translation.en: because of any worthwhile diplomatic skills
translation.zh: 是因为什么有价值的外交技巧

translation.en: or because of his political donations?
translation.zh: 还是因为他的政治捐款？

translation.en: See, that's what we do in America.
translation.zh: 你看 这就是我们在美国做的

translation.en: We just figure because someone's rich that means they're smart.
translation.zh: 我们只是觉得 有钱的人会很聪明

translation.en: My father's a moron.
He inherited his money.
-He didn't earn it. -God.
Don't tell me this is about daddy issues.
translation.zh: 别告诉我这是爸爸的问题

translation.en: I wouldn't expect you to understand.
I understand plenty.
Your father is a good man.
The best.
He served too, didn't he?
Thirty-six years.
[Kessel] That's how he met your mom? When he was stationed in Spain?
translation.zh: 他就是这样认识你妈妈的？ 他驻西班牙的时候？

translation.en: Does he still hang out with his army buddies?
translation.zh: 他还和他的军友一起玩吗？

translation.en: [Collins] Every day.
In Scottsdale, right?
translation.zh: 在斯科茨代尔 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
[Kessel] The Patriot's Valley Veterans Retirement Home.
translation.zh: 爱国者谷 退伍军人退休之家

translation.en: Room 6B.
Papa?
Let him go!
-He's got nothing to do with this! -Beg to differ.
Let him go!
You said I could kill whoever, and you'd never open this door.
translation.zh: 你说我可以杀任何人 你永远不会打开这扇门

translation.en: Let him go, God damn you!
-[Kessel] Let's see if that's still valid. -Fuck you!
translation.zh: 让我们看看这是否还有效 操你妈！

translation.en: You think it's going to go any other way?
translation.zh: 你觉得它会以其他方式发展吗？

translation.en: This is what I was trained for. Psy ops. Military intelligence.
translation.zh: 这就是我接受训练的内容 心理行动 军事情报

translation.en: Find your enemy's weak point and exploit it.
translation.zh: 找出敌人的弱点 加以利用

translation.en: [gasps] Let him go!
If you don't open the door,
I will take apart your father piece by piece.
translation.zh: 我会一块一块撕碎你父亲

translation.en: No!
-Fine. Have it your way. -No, no! Please. No, no, no!
-Do it. -No, no, no! No, don't! No!
-[Collins] No, no, no! -[groaning]
-You know I can't. -[Kessel] Yes, you can.
translation.zh: 你知道我做不到 你可以

translation.en: -No, I can't. -You can make this stop whenever you want.
Let me speak with him. Let me speak with him. Okay?
translation.zh: 让我跟他谈谈 好吧？

translation.en: -Let me speak with him! -Captain, no.
Let her speak.
[Collins] Papa?
I can't… I can't lose you.
translation.zh: 我不能… 我不能失去你

translation.en: Listen to me. Are you listening?
Never stop fighting!
-Kill him. -No! No!
-No, please God. God! -[gunshot]
No! [sobs] No, no!
My daddy would have made me open that door.
translation.zh: 如果是我爸 我爸会逼我打开那扇门

translation.en: No question!
[Shah] How did they know?
How did they know to have people in Scottsdale?
translation.zh: 他们怎么知道 还在斯科茨代尔派了人？

translation.en: The Army signed your transfer order last night, right?
translation.zh: 军方昨晚签了你的调职令 对吧？

translation.en: [panting] Right.
Which means they couldn't have known until a few hours ago.
translation.zh: 也就是说他们几个小时前才能知道

translation.en: [Kessel] You still don't get it? You're a pariah in your own ranks.
translation.zh: 你还不明白吗？ 你在自己的队伍里是贱民

translation.en: The decision to have you transferred to this godforsaken rig
translation.zh: 把你转移到这个荒芜拦截站的决定

translation.en: was made three days ago. They only told you last night.
translation.zh: 是三天之前做出来的 他们昨晚才告诉你

translation.en: I've known for 72 hours.
-[sharp inhale] What are you doing? -Activating my insurance policy.
translation.zh: 你在做什么？ 启动我的保险政策

translation.en: If she's committed enough to watch her father die,
translation.zh: 既然她有足够的忠诚 可以看着她父亲死

translation.en: you will find that I am equally as committed.
translation.zh: 你也会看到 我也同样忠诚

translation.en: That's the HVAR code. The emergency sinking protocol.
translation.zh: 高价值资产移除命令 紧急沉降程序

translation.en: You're going to sink this whole rig?
translation.zh: 你要把整个站都沉下去？

translation.en: Our telemetry's saying SBX-1's asset removal protocol just activated.
translation.zh: 我们的遥测报告说SBX-1的 高价值资产移除程序刚刚启动了

translation.en: Don't tell me he--
He's going to sink us. [gasps]
He's going to sink us using our own scuttling protocol.
translation.zh: 他要用我们自己的侦察程序沉没我们

translation.en: [computer voice] High value asset removal protocol activated.
translation.zh: 高价值资产移除程序已启动

translation.en: What do we do?
As long as we are above the surface, we can still fire our missiles.
translation.zh: 只要我们在海面以上 就还能发射导弹

translation.en: [computer voice] Thirteen minutes until total vessel submersion.
translation.zh: 距离完全淹没还有13分钟

translation.en: We've got 13 minutes to figure out a solution.
translation.zh: 我们有13分钟的时间想办法

translation.en: I'm going down there.
[Shah] Down where? Into the hulls?
Yes. To close the valves one by one.
You can't go down there with wounds like that.
translation.zh: 你那样伤着 不能下去

translation.en: I'll manage.
I'll… I'll go.
No.
I'll do it.
[Dyson] You're running out of time. We clock it at 13 minutes.
translation.zh: 你没时间了 我们还剩13分钟

translation.en: So do we.
What's the ETA on the SEAL team?
translation.zh: 海豹突击队的预计到达时间是？

translation.en: Twenty-five.
[sighs] Damn. I'll call you back.
All right.
Don't think this is what heroes look like.
translation.zh: 别以为这是英雄的样子

translation.en: That's exactly what they look like.
Whatever you say, Captain.
You can do this.
[Shah] You got this, Rahul.
You got this.
See you on the other side.
Little bastard grew some balls.
Take care of it.
This is mine.
HVAR's been activated. Twelve and a half minutes.
translation.zh: 高价值资产移除命令已启动 12分半

translation.en: Well, how far away is he?
[pilot] Twenty-two minutes out. Ready your weapons.
translation.zh: 还剩22分钟 准备好武器

translation.en: Okay, I've reached the hull.
You see the console?
This is gonna take a while.
-[Collins] You just have to slow it down. -[Shah] Copy that.
translation.zh: 你只需要放慢它下沉的速度 收到

translation.en: How are we looking, Captain?
translation.zh: 我们看起来怎么样 上尉？

translation.en: [computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
-12 minutes 11 seconds until… -[Collins] You just bought us two minutes.
translation.zh: -还有12分钟11秒… -起效了 你刚刚给我们赢得了两分钟

translation.en: Keep going.
Hell, yeah. I'm an ass-kicking, valve-closing machine.
translation.zh: 太好了 我就是个超厉害的关阀机器

translation.en: Nobody plugs leaks like me.
translation.zh: 没人能像我一样堵住漏水孔

translation.en: -Oh. Shit. -What?
I got company.
Get out of there. You hear me?
translation.zh: 快出去 你听到了吗？

translation.en: [Shah] It's too late.
It's not too late. Get out of there, now.
translation.zh: 现在还不晚 立刻离开那里

translation.en: I'm sorry I couldn't help you more before, Captain,
translation.zh: 很抱歉我之前没能帮你更多 上尉

translation.en: but I'm hoping this helps you now.
translation.zh: 但我希望现在这样能帮助你更多

translation.en: [computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
Tell my children I love them.
translation.zh: 告诉我的孩子 我爱他们

translation.en: Howdy.
You don't have to do this, Beaver.
translation.zh: 你不必这么做 海狸

translation.en: You're not a murderer.
You're right.
I'm not a murderer.
I'm a fucking patriot.
Rahul? Rahul?
[Beaver] Shah can't come to the phone right now.
translation.zh: 沙哈现在不能来接电话

translation.en: It's just you and the three of us.
You're dead.
It was a valiant attempt.
I admire his courage, truly.
translation.zh: 我真的很佩服他的勇气

translation.en: To be honest, I'd written him off.
translation.zh: 老实说 我肯定会开掉这样的人

translation.en: His psych evaluation said he'd fold under pressure.
translation.zh: 他的心理评估结果显示 会在压力下屈服

translation.en: I didn't even bother to put people on his family.
translation.zh: 根本不需要派人去抓他家人

translation.en: Turns out, he almost derailed me.
translation.zh: 结果他差点让我脱离计划

translation.en: Danilov.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu, Sierra, Bravo, 1-9-9-6.
Tell Danny to move in.
Danny?
Cut the feed.
That means nothing.
Then you won't mind if I show it to the world.
translation.zh: 那你就不介意我把它展示给全世界

translation.en: Fine.
What the hell just happened?
ZSB. Zurich Schweitz Bank.
translation.zh: ZSB 苏黎世施魏茨银行

translation.en: That's a Swiss bank account.
I should have known. [inhales]
You're not a nuclear terrorist or a fanatic.
translation.zh: 你不是核恐怖分子 也不是狂热分子

translation.en: You've been paid for this.
Hey, this is my operation. I'm the one in charge.
translation.zh: 喂 这是我的行动 我是负责人

translation.en: So what if I'm getting paid? Huh? Am I wrong?
translation.zh: 我拿到钱又怎么样？我错了吗？

translation.en: I'm destroying a system that tried to destroy you.
translation.zh: 我在破坏一个试图毁灭你的系统

translation.en: I'm making sure what happened to you doesn't happen to other women.
translation.zh: 我要确保你发生的事 不会发生在其他女人身上

translation.en: How much?
What are you doing?
Who's paying you?
Seriously, stop with the tape.
What about the Russian sub?
Stop taping the window?
The Danilov, huh? Yeah, how's Danny?
translation.zh: 丹尼洛夫 嗯？对啊 丹尼怎么样了？

translation.en: Can you please…
Please stop taping the window. For me?
translation.zh: 拜托你别再粘窗户了 为了我？

translation.en: You paid off a sub captain. Where is he taking you?
translation.zh: 你付钱给潜艇舰长 它带你去哪里？

translation.en: Stop taping the window.
Someplace you can get a new name, a new face?
translation.zh: 一个你能得到 新名字、新面孔的地方？

translation.en: Somewhere you can spend your blood money?
Stop with the damn tape, JJ.
translation.zh: 别他妈再贴了 杰洁

translation.en: What about all that shit about your father?
Oh, fuck him. He ruined my family's name!
translation.zh: 去他的 他毁了我们家族名誉

translation.en: Today I restore it with dignity and respect.
translation.zh: 今天 我要用尊严和尊重恢复了它

translation.en: [Collins] Bullshit. I saw your file.
translation.zh: 胡扯 我看了你的档案

translation.en: You're just a total fucking psycho.
-Thank you. -[Kessel] For what?
-[Collins] For showing me your weakness. -Oh, yeah. What's that?
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我看到你的弱点 是嘛 那是什么？

translation.en: [Collins] You want to get out of here alive.
[Kessel] You know what else I want? I want to hurt you, JJ.
translation.zh: 知道我还想要什么吗？ 我要伤害你 杰洁

translation.en: I want to cut off your fingers. I want you to beg me to kill you!
translation.zh: 我要切掉你的手指 我要你求我杀了你

translation.en: Cabrón.
Good job cutting the live feed. SEALS are 17 minutes out.
translation.zh: 把直播切断 做得好 海豹突击队还有17分钟到达

translation.en: Well, that's not fast enough.
This rig is going to sink in 15 minutes.
translation.zh: 这个拦截站将在15分钟后沉没

translation.en: And the second it goes under,
these assholes will launch all their nukes.
translation.zh: 这些混蛋就会发射核弹

translation.en: Is there anything you can do?
I sort of have this plan.
-But it's a little counterintuitive. -[President] Let's hear it, Captain.
translation.zh: 这有点违反直觉 让我们听听吧 上尉

translation.en: I let them take the command center.
translation.zh: 我让他们拿去指挥中心

translation.en: What? That's precisely what we don't want to happen.
translation.zh: 什么？这正是我们不想发生的事

translation.en: This rig is going down, and when it sinks, they win.
translation.zh: 这个拦截站要下沉了 一旦下沉 他们就赢了

translation.en: We have to force them to fire the missiles before that happens.
translation.zh: 我们必须在那之前 强迫他们发射导弹

translation.en: And then what?
And then I retake the command center
translation.zh: 然后我重新夺回指挥中心

translation.en: and intercept their nukes.
[Dyson] Inside 12 minutes?
Yes, sir.
[Dyson] Hold on.
Fuck.
Our game theory specialist is not convinced.
translation.zh: 我们的博弈论专家不同意

translation.en: He's uh… concerned about your motivations.
By my calculations,
your proposed plan has a 14% chance of success.
To give up that command center to a superior force
translation.zh: 把指挥中心交给更高级力量

translation.en: with no certainty of regaining it
is what we refer to as a negative outcome inducing event.
translation.zh: 我们把这称为负面后果诱导事件

translation.en: Are you serious with this shit?
translation.zh: 你说这屁话是认真的吗？

translation.en: Are you willing to gamble every life in America
translation.zh: 你甘愿把全美国人民的性命赌在

translation.en: on your ability to retake the center?
translation.zh: 你夺重新夺回指挥中心的能力上？

translation.en: I am.
I'm sorry. I cannot endorse such a move.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不能接受这种行动

translation.en: Listen, genius. You're saying my plan is running at 14%?
translation.zh: 听着 天才 你说我的计划成功率是14％？

translation.en: Yours is zero!
You haven't been beat up, strangled, or shot defending this rig today.
translation.zh: 今天被暴打、勒住、中枪 守护这个拦截站的人不是你

translation.en: So I think you'll find I'm kind of fucking motivated here.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得你会发现我有点动力

translation.en: We hear you, Captain.
I can do this, sir. I know I can.
translation.zh: 我可以的 长官 我知道我可以

translation.en: Half the people here think you're crazy.
translation.zh: 这里一半的人认为你疯了

translation.en: The other half think you're a rock star.
translation.zh: 另一半认为你是摇滚明星

translation.en: Fortunately, I'm one of the latter.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我是后者之一

translation.en: Do what you have to do, Captain.
[Collins] Still there?
-What do you think? -[Collins] I think you're getting nervous.
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？ 我觉得你有点紧张

translation.en: If you fail here, your partners will kill you.
translation.zh: 如果你在这里失败 你的搭档会杀了你

translation.en: You want this room? Come and get it.
translation.zh: 你要这个房间吗？过来拿

translation.en: [whispers] Intercom off.
Give me the radio.
Beaver, what's your ETA?
translation.zh: 海狸 你的预计到达时间是？

translation.en: [Beaver] About 30 seconds.
She's taped up the window. I can't see in the room.
translation.zh: 她把窗户贴上了 我看不见房间里了

translation.en: I need you to get in there now.
[Beaver] Relax. I'm there.
I ain't see her. She gone.
[Kessel] What do you mean, gone? Where is she?
Shit.
[Kessel] What?
She's on the roof.
Attention all missile teams, we have control of the interceptor.
translation.zh: 所有导弹小组 拦截器已被控制

translation.en: Fire all missiles. Repeat, fire all missiles.
translation.zh: 发射所有导弹 重复 发射所有导弹

translation.en: [computer voice] Multiple missile launch detected. Multiple missile launch detected.
[Beaver] Woo! Let's go, baby. Light 'em up!
translation.zh: 哇！来吧 宝贝 点燃它们

translation.en: [computer voice] Targets acquired. Targets acquired.
Seattle, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Denver, St. Louis, Memphis,
translation.zh: 西雅图、旧金山、拉斯维加斯 丹佛、圣路易斯、孟菲斯

translation.en: Chicago, Cincinnati, Atlanta, Miami, Washington DC,
translation.zh: 芝加哥、辛辛那提 亚特兰大、迈阿密、华盛顿

translation.en: Boston, New York, Dallas, Philadelphia.
translation.zh: 波士顿、纽约、达拉斯、费城

translation.en: Kill her.
[Beaver] She come for me.
"Come make ten million," he says.
"Buy yourself a private island," he says. "Piece of cake."
translation.zh: 他说：“给自己买个私人小岛” “轻而易举”

translation.en: Oh, man. [inhales]
Nope.
Give me your knife.
Do it.
Acid.
[Beaver] Where are you, darlin'?
[in singsong] Come out, come out, wherever you are.
translation.zh: 不管你在哪里 快出来！

translation.en: Apologies, ladies and gentlemen, for that rude interruption,
translation.zh: 抱歉刚才粗鲁打断 各位先生女士

translation.en: but as you can see,
I have retaken this command center and the nukes are on their way.
translation.zh: 我重新夺回了控制中心 核弹正在飞来的路上

translation.en: Hey, the goalie ain't up here.
translation.zh: 喂 守门员不在这里

translation.en: She has to be. Where else could she…
translation.zh: 她一定在 不然她还能去…

translation.en: …be?
She is on the roof, Beaver.
There's no one down here.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in eight minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射在八分钟后失效

translation.en: [whispers] Ivan.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in seven minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射七分钟后失效

translation.en: Come on.
[Beaver] Can't let you do that, darlin'.
translation.zh: 不能让你这么做 亲爱的

translation.en: Let me go, Beaver. You don't want this.
translation.zh: 放开我 海狸 你不想这样

translation.en: Hell, I told you what I wanted.
translation.zh: 见鬼 我告诉你我想怎样

translation.en: You're gonna die here.
No, I'm not.
I'm on the next submarine out of here. [chuckles]
With Alexander?
He's gone. [panting]
-[Collins groans] -[Beaver] Bullshit.
I saw him go.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射五分钟后失效

translation.en: [snickers] Really think a little bit of razor wire is gonna kill me?
translation.zh: 真的觉得用一点钢丝刺网 会弄死我吗？

translation.en: Gravity, darlin'.
[father] JJ… JJ, come on.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
The one rule in life?
Never stop fighting.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in three minutes.
translation.zh: 拦截发射三分钟后失效

translation.en: [computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 60 seconds.
There she is!
There she is!
Get up. Get up!
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 40 seconds.
[panting] Don't give up. Don't give up.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 30 seconds.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 20 seconds.
[computer voice] Ten seconds. Nine, eight, seven, six,
translation.zh: 倒数十秒 九、八、七、六、

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one.
[computer voice] Interceptors launched.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
[computer voice] Multiple missile interception complete.
Yeah! Woo-hoo!
Fourteen percent.
[Kessel] Look at you.
Still going, huh?
You know you really did fuck up my day.
translation.zh: 你还真是搞砸了我的一天

translation.en: But I brought America to the brink,
translation.zh: 但我把美国带到了危险边缘

translation.en: and I'll do it again.
You may have won the battle, but not the war.
translation.zh: 你也许在现实战斗中赢了 但这场战争你输了！

translation.en: [panting] Told you. War's not over yet.
translation.zh: 跟你说了 战争还没结束

translation.en: This is for my dad, asshole.
translation.zh: 这是为了我爸 混蛋

translation.en: [Kessel] There's my ride.
[Kessel] There's no room for you.
[man 1, in Russian] I've arrived. I can see him.
translation.zh: 我到了 我能看见他

translation.en: [man 2, in Russian] You know what to do.
[man 1] What about the woman?
[man 2] Your choice.
[pilot, in English] Target in sight. We'll arrive in 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 目标已可见 在30秒内着陆

translation.en: Contact. Russian submarine looks like it's bugging out.
translation.zh: 看见目标 俄罗斯潜艇看起来像是在离开

translation.en: We have visual on Captain Collins on the roof.
translation.zh: 等等 我看到了屋顶上的柯林斯上尉

translation.en: Madam President.
They told me you were awake. It is good to see you, Captain.
translation.zh: 他们说你醒了 很高兴见到你 上尉

translation.en: Is Fort Greely--
[President] Greely's back up. Interceptors on standby.
translation.zh: 格里利堡重新上线了 拦截器待命了

translation.en: And we're going to replace SBX-1 as soon as possible,
translation.zh: 而且我们会尽快替换掉SBX-1

translation.en: but don't worry, nobody is going to send you back out there.
translation.zh: 但别担心 没人会把你送回那里去

translation.en: In fact, I think a soldier of your caliber
translation.zh: 其实 我觉得你这样的才干

translation.en: would be better put to use on my National Security staff.
translation.zh: 放在我的国家安全队伍里应该更好

translation.en: What do you say?
[President] I'll take that as a yes.
Thank you, Madam President.
Oh, and you have another visitor.
translation.zh: 对了 你还有一位访客

translation.en: -Papa? -JJ.
I… I thought you were…
Turns out your dad has some very well-armed Army buddies
translation.zh: 看来你爸有一些武装良好的军友

translation.en: watching over him in that retirement home.
They saw what was happening on TV.
translation.zh: 他们在电视上看到了发生的事

translation.en: Broke down my goddamn door.
Saved my finger. Lost my door.
translation.zh: 救了我的手指 失去了我的门

translation.en: Well, I'll expect you to report to the White House next week, Captain.
translation.zh: 那我等你下周到白宫报到 上尉

translation.en: Come here. Dad.
Oh. Uh… This is for you.
Another survivor.
Turbo.
SEAL team found him swimming around the wreckage of SBX-1.
translation.zh: 海豹突击队 发现它在SBX-1废墟周围游

translation.en: He belonged to Corporal Shah.
[father sighs] I heard what happened. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我听说了发生的事 我很遗憾

translation.en: You know, sometimes it's…
it's best to talk about those we've lost so we don't forget.
translation.zh: 最好聊聊我们失去的人 让我们不要忘记

translation.en: His name was Rahul.
[father] Rahul?
He liked poker…
[father] I see.
…but he wasn't very good at it.
